import{createAsyncThunk}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{setHeadersToken,getUserInfoApi,signUpApi,signInApi,logoutApi}from"./authApi";export const signUpOperation=createAsyncThunk("auth/signUp",async(userData,_ref)=>{let{rejectWithValue}=_ref;try{const data=await signUpApi(userData);return data;}catch(error){return rejectWithValue(error.response.data);}});export const signInOperation=createAsyncThunk("auth/signIn",async(userData,_ref2)=>{let{rejectWithValue}=_ref2;try{const data=await signInApi(userData);return data;}catch(error){// return rejectWithValue(error.response.data);
}});export const getUserInfoOperation=createAsyncThunk("user/info",async(_,_ref3)=>{let{rejectWithValue,getState}=_ref3;try{setHeadersToken(getState().auth.accessToken);const data=await getUserInfoApi();return data;}catch(error){return rejectWithValue(error.message);}});export const logoutUserOperation=createAsyncThunk("auth/logout",()=>{logoutApi();return;});
